PAL.NAME: Microsoft Exchange 2007 - HUB/MBX (TechNet)
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Includes counters and thresholds for the Exchange Server 2007 Hub Transport and Mailbox roles based on the following product documentation: http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201704%28v=exchg.80%29 and http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb201689%28v=exchg.80%29
